DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation efficacy preemptive versus postoperative administration etoricoxib total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Benefit Preoperative vs. Postoperative Etoricoxib Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct prospective randomize control study 165 patient American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score I-III schedule primary TKA , divide 3 group : group A ( Etoricoxib 120 mg orally one hour surgery ) , group B ( Etoricoxib 120 mg orally end surgery ) group C placebo . Surgery perform spinal anesthesia . All group receive postoperative analgesia Numeric Rating Scale ( NRS ) 3 intravenous ( IV ) Perfalgan morphine demand follow 48 h. The effectiveness evaluate time initiation spinal anesthesia first analgesic dose NRS > 3 , total amount morphine first 24 48 hour postoperative , side effect necessary amount adjuvant medication .
